thread.title: Relationships That Please God Part 2B Building Relationships
thread.title_full: Relationships That Please God Part 2B Building Relationships

author: Resurrection Life of Jesus
title: Relationships That Please God Part 2B Building Relationships
text:
In this second message, Pastor John gives you a tour of what life was like during the time of Abraham and Sarah by explaining how food was prepared on a daily basis, what it was like to live in tents and that few people lived outside the cities in the open range of Canaan. He then describes how Abraham and Sarahâ€™s unbelief created strife when they became impatient and tried to help God.
Ishmael, the son that Abraham fathered with Hagar, caused much strife and was rejected by God who told Abraham that Sarah would still conceive the child of promise. Abraham believed God and the new covenant was sealed by circumcision. The testing which Abraham and Sarah endured is no different today as God is still seeking those who will listen and obey.
Sermon Outline: https://eaec.org/sermons/2009/RLJ-1203.pdf
RLJ-1203 -- SEPTEMBER 13, 2009
